name: Zombie_Plan
message:
YAY! More Rex. I am le happy. Is this the start of a whole new arc, or another fun "break from the norm"?

Also I noticed some grammar mistakes: In the third paragraph it should read "an island", and in the sixth it should be "remaining men".
Actually, now I think of it, maybe Mr. Nunn is trying to slip in a little ARG fun in his story. the letter added was a D, and the letter missing is an N. DN? Devious Nippal?

>_>
